content: 1 ball dk cotton 1 4mm crochet hook r1 - chain 13 skip 1st chain and double_crochet into 2nd chain from hook double_crochet along both side of chain 24dc add stitch marker if desired r2 - *half_double_crochet into double_crochet repeat from * to end r3 - repeat r3 until work measures 11cm flap half_double_crochet 12 st from beg of round turn chain 2 half_double_crochet into half_double_crochet to end of row continue until flap measures 5 5cm sew press stud to pouch and flap
